resources.string: " SELECT t.name FROM tag_archive AS ta, archive AS a, tag AS t WHERE ta.tag_id=t.id AND ta.archive_id=a.id AND a.full_path=? AND a.size=? AND ta.archive_position=? "
" SELECT name FROM city WHERE id = (SELECT from_city_id FROM line WHERE line.name=?) OR id=(SELECT to_city_id FROM line WHERE line.name=?) "
